snippet: At a preseason press tour, the newsmakers of the industry gave a preview of offerings.
abstract: Television industry insiders give preview of offerings during annual tour of Television Critics Association; also announce that Ellen DeGeneres will host Academy Awards ceremony in March 2014.
lead_paragraph: At a preseason press tour, the newsmakers of the industry gave a preview of offerings.

headline.main: Surprise at TV Critics’ Gathering: DeGeneres Is to Host the Oscars
headline.print_headline: Surprise at TV Critics’ Gathering: DeGeneres Is to Host the Oscars
